endpointType.description: Endpoint protocol type, either http or tchannel

thriftFile.description: Path to endpoint thrift file, relative to idl path

thriftFileSha.description: Sha of the thrift file, reserved but currently not used

thriftMethodName.description: Thrift method name, in format of service::method

workflowType.description: Workflow type, either httpClient, tchannelClient or custom

workflowImportPath.description: Workflow import path if workflow type is custom

clientId.description: Client ID if workflow is to proxy client

clientMethod.description: Client method if workflow is to proxy client

items.description: Middlewares the endpoint method depends on
